interlinear-text.item: I sing to you like a nightingale
Recorded by Husniya Khujamyorova in Vrang, Tajikistan, June, 2016.

phrase.item: A long dress is wrapped, hundred shame for parents, oh brother.
A daughter was given (married) in a bad place, oh brother, their daughter was given (married) in a bad place, oh.
Oh brother, I sing like a nightingale for you.
------ I admire those who have parents.
Oh an orphan's mouth is dry (thirsty), oh, an orphan's mouth is dry (thirsty).
Oh, I sing like nightingale for you.
The wind is also like mountain wind, oh, brother don't breath deep.
The deep breath of sorrow wind, oh, brother the deep breath of sorrow.
Oh, brother I sing for you like a nightingale. Red (hair extention) if you consider me as a sister,
Oh, brother write my name on a letter, oh, brother write my name on a letter
Oh, I sing for you like nightingale.
You body is short, everything is possible to find,
Oh, dear parents are a rarity to find, oh brother, dear parents are a rarity to find.
Oh, brother I sing like a nightingale for you.
